alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 29 at 4:50AM MDT until October 29 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MDT /1 PM CDT/ TODAY... * WHAT...Up to one inch of snow accumulation. * WHERE...Portions of east central Colorado and northwest and west central Kansas. * WHEN...Until noon MDT /1 PM CDT/ Sunday. * IMPACTS...Snow cover on area roads will create hazardous travel conditions.
info.instruction: Hazardous travel conditions are possible across the advisory area. If you must travel, slow down, turn off cruise control, and exercise additional caution, particularly at intersections and highway onramps and offramps where accidents are more likely to occur. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
